attributes.action: give interest rates to charities equal to personal bank accounts Lloyds BG banks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our charity has a sizeable amount of money to bank in a safe (not shares) savings account with monthly interest. We use the interest to help children who are sick or disabled, who have nowhere else to ask for help. We can open an account with Halifax for 2.4 % gross /2yrs, but same Halifax account for personal customer is 3.71% gross / 2yrs.
Why can we not be equal to personal customers? Can you make the interest rates the same for charities and personal customers please, for the banks that the taxpayer owns majority of like Halifax?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
